meanings.definition: The quality or state of being conical.
meanings.sent1: The conicities of the ice cream cone made it easy to hold.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the conicities of the mountain peaks in the painting.
meanings.sent3: The conicities of the traffic cones seemed to dance in the wind.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, styled in conicities, resembled a soft serve ice cream cone.
meanings.sent5: The conicities of the volcano's peak were sharp and imposing.

meanings.definition: The presence of conical shapes or forms.
meanings.sent1: The conicities of the party hats added a festive touch to the celebration.
meanings.sent2: The conicities of the pine trees stood out against the flat landscape.
meanings.sent3: The conicities of the traffic cones made them look like tiny wizard hats.
meanings.sent4: The conicities of the seashells on the beach reminded her of miniature ice cream cones.
meanings.sent5: The conicities of the tent peaks reached towards the sky like sharp fingers.
